name: Fat Bunny Jump
description:
How high can you jump? Fat Bunny jump is a very addictive jump adventure game. Jump to collect easter eggs, coins, diamonds etc. Tilt to move left or right.

Features:
-Very cute graphics.
-Game Center leaderboards.
-Retina display optimised.
-Perfect support for iPhone 6, 6 Plus and iOS 8.
-Universal game: iPhone, iPad, iPad Mini, iPod Touch.

Enjoy!
